医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
生物混合机器人利用实验室培养的肌肉进行急剧旋转与机器人相比，人体灵活，能够进行精细动作，能够高效地将能量转化为运动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Biohybrid-robot-makes-sharp-rotations-with-lab-grown-muscles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Biohybrid-robot-makes-sharp-rotations-with-lab-grown-muscles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85585c5d-a47a-4278-99b7-f6bd96dc0399 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 12:26:56 -0500 Biohybrid robot makes sharp rotations with lab-grown muscles
某种类型的化疗被发现可以提高免疫系统抵抗膀胱癌的能力根据一月份发表在《细胞报告医学》杂志上的一项研究，蒂施癌症研究所的研究人员发现，某种类型的化疗可以提高免疫系统抵抗膀胱癌的能力，特别是与免疫疗法结合使用时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/A-certain-type-of-chemotherapy-found-to-improve-the-immune-systems-ability-to-fight-off-bladder-cancer。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/A-certain-type-of-chemotherapy-found-to-improve-the-immune-systems-ability-to-fight-off-bladder-cancer。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eea92ccc-e5fb-4dd4-97fa-6e55b8cd3e85 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 12:15:50 -0500 A certain type of chemotherapy found to improve the immune system's ability to fight off bladder cancer
突变蝴蝶效应：研究揭示单一变化如何触发自闭症基因网络RIKEN 脑科学中心 (CBS) 的研究人员通过分析个人及其家庭基因组的突变来研究自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 的遗传学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Mutation-butterfly-effect-Study-reveals-how-single-change-triggers-autism-gene-network.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Mutation-butterfly-effect-Study-reveals-how-single-change-triggers-autism-gene-network.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c8d68c7-12b3-4d90-a5b0-8042637404e5 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 12:05:42 -0500 Mutation butterfly effect: Study reveals how single change triggers autism gene network
研究显示 14 年来与紧急避孕相关的急诊就诊人数急剧减少一项新的研究表明，继 2006 年联邦批准非处方紧急避孕药后，美国各地急诊科的相关就诊次数和医疗费用急剧下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Study-reveals-dramatic-decreases-in-emergency-contraception-lated-ER-visits-over-14-year-period.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Study-reveals-dramatic-decreases-in-emergency-contraception-lated-ER-visits-over-14-year-period.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4b487be-672a-4fe1-b01e-68485efac947 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 11:56:16 -0500 Study reveals dramatic decreases in emergency contraception related ER visits over 14 year period
使用内置生长因子种植肉类可降低成本细胞农业——利用生物反应器中生长的细胞生产肉类，而不是从农场动物身上收获——正在技术上取得飞跃，使其成为食品工业更可行的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Growing-meat-with-built-in-growth-factors-cuts-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Growing-meat-with-built-in-growth-factors-cuts-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32fc13da-a2b9-4877-940a-a50abf5f7a4d Sat, 27 Jan 2024 08:07:44 -0500 Growing meat with built-in growth factors cuts costs
欧洲通过人工智能驱动的“PAIR”项目为未来的流行病做好准备欧盟资助的新五年项目PAIR刚刚在哥本哈根启动，来自7个国家的20个合作伙伴参与其中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Europe-gears-up-for-future-pandemics-with-AI-powered-PAIR-project.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Europe-gears-up-for-future-pandemics-with-AI-powered-PAIR-project.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ab75e4f-1de4-4342-97d2-2f4608a77d85 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 07:44:39 -0500 Europe gears up for future pandemics with AI-powered "PAIR" project
神经网络在手术中提供乳房对称性的精确分析美国整形学会官方医学杂志《整形与重建外科》二月号上的一项研究表明，新开发的神经网络在识别乳房手术中重要的关键标志方面高度准确，开启了客观评估乳房对称性的潜力外科医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Neural-network-provides-precise-analysis-of-breast-symmetry-in-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Neural-network-provides-precise-analysis-of-breast-symmetry-in-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f408dc3-df8e-4529-901a-12889140da00 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 07:38:13 -0500 Neural network provides precise analysis of breast symmetry in surgery
免疫治疗突破：派姆单抗延长侵袭性膀胱癌的复发时间患有肌肉浸润性尿路上皮癌且术后复发风险高的患者可能有新的治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Immunotherapy-breakthrough-Pembrolizumab-extends-time-to-recurrence-in-aggressive-bladder-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Immunotherapy-breakthrough-Pembrolizumab-extends-time-to-recurrence-in-aggressive-bladder-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a9dfc46-70bb-42ec-bbbe-ce822b3e0ac7 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 07:33:03 -0500 Immunotherapy breakthrough: Pembrolizumab extends time to recurrence in aggressive bladder cancer
低剂量辐射有望治疗脑损伤和中风创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 和缺血性中风是主要的公共卫生问题，也是全世界死亡和残疾的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Low-dose-radiation-shows-promise-as-treatment-for-brain-injury-and-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Low-dose-radiation-shows-promise-as-treatment-for-brain-injury-and-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf578bd8-8b22-47f4-bcdb-a3e8c203382a Sat, 27 Jan 2024 07:26:09 -0500 Low-dose radiation shows promise as treatment for brain injury and stroke
在鼻淋巴管中发现大脑废物清除途径在《自然》杂志上发表的一项开创性研究中，基础科学研究所 (IBS) 血管研究中心主任 KOH Gou Young 领导的韩国研究人员发现了鼻后部独特的淋巴管网络，该网络在鼻后部发挥着关键作用。从大脑中排出脑脊液（CSF）的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Brains-waste-removal-route-found-in-nasal-lymphatics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Brains-waste-removal-route-found-in-nasal-lymphatics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fb2bb00-7618-441e-875e-e7c1ab0be3b1 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 07:04:59 -0500 Brain's waste removal route found in nasal lymphatics
